verses.verse: O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation <S%H3444><s%>, I have cried <S%H6817><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and night before you <S%H3915><s%>:
Let my prayer <S%H8605><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H5186><s%>: incline your ear <S%H241><s%> unto my cry <S%H7440><s%>;
For my soul <S%H5315><s%> is full <S%H7646><s%> of troubles <S%H7451><s%>: and my life <S%H2416><s%> draws near <S%H5060><s%> unto the grave <S%H7585><s%>.
I am counted <S%H2803><s%> with them that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>: I am as a man <S%H1397><s%> that has no strength <S%H353><s%>:

Free <S%H2670><s%> among the dead <S%H4191><s%>, like the slain <S%H2491><s%> that lie <S%H7901><s%> in the grave <S%H6913><s%>, whom you you remember <S%H2142><s%> no more <S%H1504><s%>: and they are cut off from your hand <S%H3027><s%>.
You have laid <S%H7896><s%> me in the lowest <S%H8482><s%> pit <S%H953><s%>, in darkness <S%H4285><s%>, in the deeps <S%H4688><s%>.
Your wrath <S%H2534><s%> lies hard <S%H5564><s%> upon me <S%H6031><s%>, and you have afflicted me with all your waves <S%H4867><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

You have put away <S%H7368><s%> my acquaintance <S%H3045><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H7896><s%>; you have made me a abomination <S%H8441><s%> unto them <S%H3607><s%>: I am shut up, and I cannot come forth <S%H3318><s%>.

My eye <S%H5869><s%> mourns <S%H1669><s%> by reason of affliction <S%H6040><s%>: Lord <S%H3068><s%>, I have called <S%H7121><s%> daily <S%H3117><s%> upon you <S%H7849><s%>, I have stretched out my hands unto you <S%H3709><s%>.
Will you show <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6382><s%> to the dead <S%H4191><s%>? shall the dead <S%H7496><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%> and praise <S%H3034><s%> you <S%H5542><s%>? Selah.
Shall your lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> be declared <S%H5608><s%> in the grave <S%H6913><s%>? or your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> in destruction <S%H11><s%>?
Shall your wonders <S%H6382><s%> be known <S%H3045><s%> in the dark <S%H2822><s%>? and your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of forgetfulness <S%H5388><s%>?
But unto you have I cried <S%H7768><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> shall my prayer <S%H8605><s%> meet you <S%H6923><s%>.
Lord <S%H3068><s%>, why cast you off <S%H2186><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>? why hide <S%H5641><s%> you your face from me <S%H6440><s%>?
I am afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and ready to die <S%H1478><s%> from my youth <S%H5290><s%> up <S%H5375><s%>: while I suffer your terrors <S%H367><s%> I am distracted <S%H6323><s%>.
Your fierce wrath <S%H2740><s%> goes over <S%H5674><s%> me <S%H1161><s%>; your terrors have cut me off <S%H6789><s%>.
They came round about <S%H5437><s%> me daily <S%H3117><s%> like water <S%H4325><s%>; they surrounded <S%H5362><s%> me about together <S%H3162><s%>.
Lover <S%H157><s%> and friend <S%H7453><s%> have you put far <S%H7368><s%> from me <S%H3045><s%>, and mine acquaintance into darkness <S%H4285><s%>.
